pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimators of Non-Linear Cross-Validated Risks Optimized for Small Samples // Methods for obtaining improved estimates of non-linear cross-validated risks are obtained using targeted minimum loss-based estimation, estimating equations, and one- step estimation. Cross-validated area under the receiver operating characteristics curve (LeDell, Petersen, van der Laan (2015), doi:10.1214/15-EJS1035) and other metrics are included.
